0.user_question: A pirate searches seven islands for buried treasure. If each island has a $\frac{1}{5}$ chance of having treasure, what is the probability that exactly 4 of the islands have treasure?

ost_step.1: The probability of finding treasure on any island is $\frac{1}{5}$.
ost_step.2: Therefore, the sum of the probability of finding treasure on any two islands is $\boxed{1}$.
ost_step.3: So, the probability that exactly 4 of the 7 islands have treasure is $\boxed{4}$.
